data.title: Leith St Andrew's Parish Church

data.text:
Along with other local Churches of Scotland, we have a volunteer run Foodbank which operates out of our Easter Road Hall on Tuesday afternoon from 1-2.30pm and Thursday mornings from 10-11.30am.

The Edinburgh NE Foodbank primarily helps those in the EH6 and EH7 areas. You need a voucher to get a food parcel, which will contain three days worth of food. Details of how to get help and where to get a voucher can be found on the foodbank website here: Get Help

Details of days and venues where the Foodbank is open

Monday – South Leith Halls in Henderson Street – 1-2.30pm

Tuesday – Leith St Andrew’s in Easter Road – 1-2.30pm

Wednesday – St Margaret’s Halls in Restalrig Village – 11am-12.30pm

Wednesday – Pilrig St Paul’s in Pilrig Street – 4.30-6pm

Thursday – Leith St Andrew’s – 10-11.30am
